Package structure

Class Queen

java.lang.Object
structure.Cell
structure.Queen
public class Queen
extends Cell
This is the subclass Queen which extends the abstract class Cell. The Queen class implements the movement of Queen piece on the board.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Queen

      public Queen​(java.lang.String cellName, java.lang.String pieceName, boolean isAlive, int x, int y)
      Initialize the Queen object with cellName, pieceName, isAlive, x, y.
      Parameters:
      cellName - The cell's name, such as "##" or " ",which is under the Queen piece.
      pieceName - The Queen piece's name, such as "wQ" or "bQ".
      isAlive - The boolean value to show whether the piece is alive on the board.
      x - The x-coordinate of the piece on the board.
      y - The y-coordinate of the piece on the board.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public boolean move​(int currX, int currY, int tarX, int tarY)
      This method performs the movement of a Queen piece from current point to targeting point.
      Specified by:
      move in class Cell
      Parameters:
      currX - The x-coordinate of starting point in the movement.
      currY - The y-coordinate of starting point in the movement.
      tarX - The x-coordinate of targeting point in the movement.
      tarY - The y-coordinate of targeting point in the movement.
      Returns:
      True if successfully move. Otherwise, return false.

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> list, java.lang.Integer[] arr)
      This method is going to decide whether the ArrayList contains my Integer array.
      Parameters:
      list - The ArrayList
      arr - My Integer Array contains x and y coordinates
      Returns:
      True if contains. Otherwise, return false.

    • detector

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer[]> detector​(int currX, int currY)
      This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Queen can reach.
      Parameters:
      currX - The x-coordinate of Queen
      currY - The y-coordinate of Queen
      Returns:
      The ArrayList contains all of the possible locations.

    • Searcher

      public java.util.ArrayList<Point> Searcher()
      This method is going to search all of the possible location where the Queen can reach.
      Specified by:
      Searcher in class Cell
      Returns:
      The ArrayList contains all of the possible locations. Null if no possible location.
